title: Himi 341
lyrics:
4-6’s & 2-8’s
1.
Ke fai ‘e māmani,
Mo hēvani foki,
‘A e hiva lelei,
Ko e fakafeta’i,
‘I he hoko ‘a e ‘Eiki,
Ko e tangata mo’oni.
2.
Pea na’e tupu,
‘I he’etau anga,
Pea na’e fufū,
‘A hono ‘Otua,
Ko e tangata totonu,
Ko Imanuela ia.
3.
Ko ‘ene fu’u ‘ofa,
Kia kitautolu,
‘Oku ma’olunga,
Pea mahu’inga,
Pea fakahā ‘i lalo,
Ko hotau ‘Otua ‘ofa.
4.
Pea fekau ia
Ke tau loto liliu;
Pea fua ia,
Hotau laumālie,
Pea ke tau ma’u ‘i loto,
‘A hotau ‘Otua lelei.
5.
Pea tau lava’i,
‘A e loto ma’a,
Ke tau teunga’aki,
Ki hono fofonga,
Pea ‘e toki fakahā,
Hono lahi ‘o e ‘ofa. *
